comments: Denominators of coefficient in LambertW(x) power series, where LambertW(x) is the transcendental function satisfying LambertW(x)*exp( LambertW(x) )=x - _Benoit Cloitre_, May 08 2002Absolute value of denominator of the coefficient of 1/(n*x-1) in the partial fraction decomposition of 1/(x-1)*1/(2*x-1)*...*1/(n*x-1). [From Joris Roos (jorisr(AT)gmx.de), Aug 02 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
